channel.title: Feedback on a WIP - Insolidarity [IDM, Chillwave]
channel.description:
So I started this thing and I wanna get it as perfect as possible so I’ve been asking for feedback this far in production: https://soundcloud.com/insolidaritymusic/broken-devotee/s-LSZeb
Give me your honest thoughts

item.description:
Thanks! The only thing is I played it in the car and the bass linebacker completely covered up the arp so I wanna try to mix it versatily

item.title: Feedback on a WIP - Insolidarity [IDM, Chillwave]
item.dc:creator: INDIR3CT
item.description:
Very nice! The only things Id suggest is increasing the bass a little bit, kinda gets lost in the song.

Other than that, great track so far!
